example[0]: He’s very bullish about the company’s prospects.
definition[1]: in a business market that is bullish, the prices of shares are rising or seem likely to rise
definition[2]: expecting prices on a financial market to rise or economic activity to increase
example[1]: We’re not bullish in terms of an art market recovery this year.
example[2]: Good results from Schering encouraged a bullish mood in pharmaceuticals.
example[3]: It’s hard to find analysts who aren’t bullish on banks.
